metadata.title: CVE-2022-30126 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Apache Tika, a regular expression in our StandardsText class, used bythe StandardsExtractingContentHandler could lead to a denial of servicecaused by backtracking on a specially crafted file. This only affects userswho are running the StandardsExtractingContentHandler, which is anon-standard handler. This is fixed in 1.28.2 and 2.4.0

criterions.comment: tika: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
